description:
Hosomichi is taken to Arahabaki`s base after the events at Kabukicho. In order to pay for his debts, he is forced to become a pilot of Shark One. To him, it`s just another job and another paycheck. However, pleasing Rin may be harder than he expects.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Want to Believe in You (Somehow)!
君を(なんとか)信じたい!!
